text: John of Aragon (1304–1334, Pobo, Saragossa) was a prince of Aragon. He was the son of James II of Aragon and his second wife Blanche of Anjou. He was archbishop of Toledo from 1319 until 1328. He became archbishop of Tarragona in 1327 and Latin Patriarch of Alexandria in 1328, holding both posts until his death. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20150924055242/http://www.grec.cat/cgibin/heccl2.pgm?NDCHEC=0034645 Category:House of Aragon Category:Archbishops of Tarragona Category:Archbishops of Toledo Category:1304 births Category:1334 deaths
title: John of Aragon (patriarch)
